intro.vedio: Watch the video to learn more about the system

hero.title: Modern Birga Store Management System
hero.description: A complete and modern system for managing your store or business that is compatible with the system. This system can manage your store and business operations from purchasing, selling, accounting, reporting and more. With beautiful interface and easy use. With high quality and latest technology, the fastest system at an affordable price

speed.title: Fast in Operations
speed.description: Fast in performing actions and processing data in a new and active way

security.title: Privacy Protection
security.description: Setting a password for performing deletion actions and confirming the action

guide.title: Guidance and Explanation Feature
guide.description: Guides the user and analyzes the sections that exist on the page and explains how to use them

backup.title: Data Storage
backup.description: When working locally, it stores a copy of your data in a safe place like Google Drive on the user's email and other places

permissions.title: Permissions and Users
permissions.description: Access to pages by users is determined by you

color.title: System Color Settings
color.description: You can change the system colors in a new way on all pages, by selecting a color

grid.title: System Layout Settings
grid.description: You can change the system layout in a new way on all pages, card style or table style

website.title: A Website for Marketing System Products
website.description: This system has a dedicated marketing website that can be easily shared with customers to view and market products

feature1.title: Advanced Design
feature1.description: Designed in an advanced way that enables customers to use the website easily

feature2.title: Customer Registration
feature2.description: Records customers' basic information so you can contact them and get confirmation

feature3.title: Website Control
feature3.description: Through the system, you can control your website in displaying products, discounts, or special sections for discounts and latest products

feature4.title: Order Status
feature4.description: Order status is managed through the system which includes preparation, delivery, waiting, or cancellation status and cancellation reason. Customers can view their order status through the website

about.title: About the Developer
about.description1: I am Darawan Omar, a passionate developer for new technology who created this comprehensive business management system. This platform is built with the latest technologies including Next.js as both parts of the system including "Backend" and "Frontend" which ensures the best performance, development and user experience.
about.description2: The system is designed in a very good way and is available in both online and offline modes, where in offline mode you can transfer data backups to Google Drive and your own computer for more protection from loss.
